scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Holy Family on a journey, with the Virgin Mary seated on a donkey, holding the Christ Child. Joseph, an older man with a beard and a hooded cloak, walks beside the donkey, holding a staff. In the background, a fortified castle is visible, and to the right, a group of figures are harvesting in a field, with one figure actively cutting stalks of grain. The overall setting is a pastoral landscape under a blue sky.
